description:
text/template: add examples that use multiple templates

Fixes issue 2742.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, peterthrun@ymail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

I think it will be helpful to include an example similar to these with the 
use of Funcs or Delims. 
>
>

http://codereview.appspot.com/5699083/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go
File src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5699083/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go#newcode46
src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go:46: testGlob := []templateFile{
s/testGlob/helperFiles/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5699083/diff/3002/src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go
File src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5699083/diff/3002/src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go#newcode44
src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go:44: // usually the template definition files would live near the source.
I don't think they necessarily would live near the source. In App Engine, yes, but in other environments they'd live in some data directory known to the program.

"Here we create a temporary directory and populate it with our sample template definition files; usually the template files would already exist in some location known to the program."

http://codereview.appspot.com/5699083/diff/3002/src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go#newcode64
src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go:64: err := tmpl.Execute(os.Stdout, "")
s/""/nil/g

http://codereview.appspot.com/5699083/diff/3002/src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go#newcode152
src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go:152: // Execute the template.
perhaps save the execution of the templates until the end, then just do them one after the other. the lesson is clear without the repetition.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5699083/diff/3002/src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go#newcode159
src/pkg/text/template/examplefiles_test.go:159: // Again, clone the helpers.
1. Clone the helpers.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1e7ecf40d9e9 ***
